question:
In their advertising, businesses nowadays usually emphasise that their products are new in some way.
Why is this? 
Do you think it is a positive or negative development?
text: Nowadays companies announce in their advertisements that their products are new in some way. This could have several reasons. From my point of view ,this would be a positive expansion. I'm going to explain some details below.

Firstly ,there are multiple reasons why is this. One of the main causes is stiff competition among companies especially ,big brand names. For example ,we all know to sell products businesses are required to create a strong advert and introduce new items. Because there are numerous firms in the world and most of them tend to sell their products to make a good profit. To achieve these scopes changing something and showing new things are essential. Therefore ,this makes it clear why businesses decide to perform these ways.

Secondly ,there is no denying that it is an indispensable operation. For instance ,the population who live in the world habitually need to have the latest items to have a better life in today modern world. Needless to say ,all item's qualities are being changed thanks to the noticeable transform in people's lifestyles. Introducing new commodities via different brands could be useful for human beings because of the above reasons. As a result ,it becomes apparent there is a conspicuous reason behind each activity via businesses that we can not ignore.

All things considered ,I believe that this is a positive and suitable operation to conduct. It is predicted that to continue producing substances that are new in some methods we will encounter surprising items in the near future.
